prompt: A magnificent celestial artifact, known as the Orb of the Dragon Star, floating in the vastness of space. The orb radiates a bright, ethereal light that casts a rainbow of colors across the surrounding cosmic dust and distant nebulae. Intricate, ancient runes are inscribed around its translucent surface, shimmering as if alive. In the background, the silhouettes of majestic starships and vibrant star clusters add depth to this awe-inspiring scene. The art style is bright and ethereal, blending futuristic technology with mystical, ancient aesthetics.
